welcome_message_body: Welcome to Haiphong, Vietnam! Get ready to experience the charm of our bustling port city, known for its stunning coastlines, vibrant culture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Haiphong has to offer.

restaurants.name: Texas BBQ
restaurants.description: Texas BBQ is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Bánh Đa Cua Bà Cụ
restaurants.description: Bánh Đa Cua Bà Cụ is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Nhà hàng Gia Viên
restaurants.description: Nhà hàng Gia Viên is a ukrainian restaurant located in Hải Phòng.
restaurants.address: 2 Bạch Đằng, Hải Phòng, Thành Phố Hải Phòng

restaurants.name: COFFE FOCUS
restaurants.description: COFFE FOCUS is a café located in Hải Phòng.
restaurants.address: 20 Minh Khai, Hoàng Văn Thụ, Hồng Bàng, Hải Phòng (MINH KHAI), Hải Phòng, Thành Phố Hải Phòng

restaurants.name: Maxim
restaurants.description: Maxim is a vietnamese restaurant located in Hải Phòng.
restaurants.address: 49 Dien Bien Phu, Hải Phòng, Thành Phố Hải Phòng

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Catbi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Catbi Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
